Features of Built Applications

You can use LabVIEW-built applications on other computers and from other programming languages. LabVIEW-built applications have specific features. For example, the data type characteristic of the .NET interop assembly has specific features.

Related Topics

The following topics discuss characteristics of different types of LabVIEW-built applications:

  • Characteristics of LabVIEW-Built .NET Interop Assemblies
  • Characteristics of LabVIEW-Built Shared Libraries
